title: What is the benefit of technology while travelling? - Quora

response.answer_text: Well , i think it does help alot , you can use google map to know your location , near restaurants , near hotels , and many other things. you can communicate with your family from all over the world just with the need of WIFi , no sim card is needed , you can also use it for GPS. reading, watching , playing in case you are bored . you can use websites to get information about native , culture and many other stuffs about place you would love to visit . you can use also technology to share your adventure and travelling in social networks with your friends . thats all what i know , i wish i was little helpfull
